Page 1195
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Subject: RE: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein
Sent: Sat, 10 Aug 2019 15:12:51 -0400

Thank you.

(b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Esq.
20 Park Plaza
Suite 1000
Boston, MA 02116
(617) 227 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Office
(617) 901 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) Cell
=====================================================
This Electronic Message contains information from the Law Office of (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) P.C., and may be privileged. The information is intended for the use of the addressee only. If you are not the addressee, please note that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or use of the contents of this message is prohibited.
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @bop.gov]
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 1:57 PM
To: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov
Cc: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov
Subject: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein

Good afternoon,

Enclosed please find official notification from Warden N'Diaye regarding Mr. Epstein's passing. As the investigation is ongoing, we have no further details at this time. We will continue to keep you updated as more information is available.

Thank you,
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)

Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836 (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
f: (646)836-7665

DOJ-OGR-00025400
